title: Crafting mud runes

properties.name: description
properties.value:
The above rates are calculated assuming use of the small, medium, and large essence pouches for 40 Pure Essence per inventory. It also assumes 80 trips per hour.
Rates will be slightly lower without the pouches.

content:
Crafting mud runes
Requirements
Skills
  • 13 (50 recommended for Large Pouch)
  • 82 for Magic Imbue
  • 70 recommended for Revitalization pool
  • 60+ recommended for run regeneration
Items
  • Pure essence, Water rune, Astral rune,
  • Steam battlestaff,
  • Binding necklace, Ring of dueling, Digsite pendant,
  • Earth tiara, essence pouches
    • Quest
  • Lunar diplomacy for access to Magic Imbue and NPC Contact
  • Enter the Abyss for Dark Mage (Abyss) NPC in NPC Contact
  • The Dig Site for access to Digsite Pendant
  • Enlightened Journey for access to Balloon transport system for transport to Varrock
    • Other
    Graceful outfit
    Results
    ProfitExperience gained
    445,300 30,000
    Inputs (95,500)Outputs (540,800)
    3,200 × Pure essence (6,400)3,200 × Water rune (16,000)160 × Astral rune (20,800)10 × Binding necklace (8,830)10 × Ring of dueling(8) (7,890)20 × Ruby necklace (22,420) for making Digsite Pendant(5)20 × Cosmic rune (2,280) for making Digsite Pendant(5)20 × Nature rune (4,000) for alching Digsite Pendant(1)10 × Teleport to house (tablet) (5,280)80 × Willow logs (1,600) for use Balloon3,200 × Mud rune (512,000)28,800 × Coins (28,800) from alching Digsite Pendant(1)

    The above rates are calculated assuming use of the small, medium, and large essence pouches for 40 Pure Essence per inventory. It also assumes 80 trips per hour. Rates will be slightly lower without the pouches.

    Equip a binding necklace, ring of dueling, earth tiara & steam battlestaff. In your inventory, take a pile of astral runes and water runes, a Digsite pendant and your essence pouches. Fill your pouches and the rest of your inventory with Pure essence. Make sure you are on the Lunar spellbook.

    Digsite Pendant run

    Before starting your runs, switch to the Standard spellbook and enchant all the ruby necklaces in to as many Digsite pendants as you'll need.

    1. Use a Digsite pendant to teleport to the Digsite
    2. Run north-west and enter the Earth Altar
    3. Cast Magic imbue
    4. Use Water runes on the altar
    5. Empty all the runecrafting pouches and use water runes on the altar again
    6. Teleport to Castle Wars with the ring of dueling and bank, storing Mud runes and filling pouches and inventory with Pure essence
    • Every 4 runs, replace your nearly empty Digsite Pendant(1) with a new Digsite Pendant(5)
    • Every 8 runs, in addition to above, equip a new Binding Necklace and new Ring of Dueling as well (Current ones would have turned to dust)
    • When you run out (or are nearly running out) of energy at a bank, take a Teleport to house (tablet) with you for your next run and use it to replenish energy at a Revitalization pool. Alternatively, a player can use their ring of dueling to teleport to Ferox Enclave and begin the next run by drinking from the Pool of Refreshment to replenish run energy before teleporting to the digsite.
      • At 70+ agility with full graceful (minus hood), expect to use a house tablet every 8 runs (this syncs up with the binding necklace expiring)
    • When your pouches degrade, withdraw 2 Air rune and a Cosmic rune and use NPC contact to contact the Dark Mage (Abyss) for pouch repairs.

    After completing your runs, switch back to the standard spellbook and cast High level alchemy on your remaining Digsite Pendant(1)s.

    Balloon run

    Alternatively, if access to the Balloon transport system is available it can be used to travel from Castle Wars directly to the Earth Altar for the cost of a Willow log Before starting your runs, load up the balloon system with Willow logs.

    This method is slightly slower than the Digsite Pendant one but is considerably simpler (Note: The Revitalization pool method for restoring energy won't work as well in this run, use Stamina potions

    1. Starting at Castle Wars, run to balloon and take it to Varrock
    2. Enter the nearby Earth Altar
    3. Cast Magic imbue
    4. Use Water runes on the altar
    5. Empty all the essence pouches and use water runes on the altar again
    6. Teleport to Castle Wars with the ring of dueling and bank, storing Mud runes and filling pouches and inventory with Pure essence
    • Every 8 runs, equip a new Binding Necklace and new Ring of Dueling as well (Current ones would have turned to dust)

    Notes

    • You can replace the Steam battlestaff with a stack of Fire runes and extra Water runes but this will use up an essence spot
    • If you don't have access to a Revitalization pool, you can instead use Stamina potions but these will typically cost more to maintain your run energy compared to Teleport to house (tablet)s
    • The Ring of dueling can be replaced with any teleport near a bank
      • A charged Amulet of glory to Edgeville works for a cheaper alternative but requires replacing every 4 runs and takes up an essence space
      • With Crafting cape and the Falador diary#Hard completed, the crafting guild bank is a free teleport alternative that won't take up an essence space.

|Details = The above rates are calculated assuming use of the small, medium, and large [[essence pouch]]es for 40 [[Pure Essence]] per inventory. It also assumes 80 trips per hour.
Rates will be slightly lower without the pouches.

Equip a [[binding necklace]], [[ring of dueling]], [[earth tiara]] & [[steam battlestaff]]. In your inventory, take a pile of [[astral runes]] and [[water runes]], a [[Digsite pendant]] and your [[essence pouch]]es. Fill your pouches and the rest of your inventory with [[Pure essence]]. Make sure you are on the [[Lunar spellbook]].

=== Digsite Pendant run ===
Before starting your runs, switch to the [[Standard spellbook]] and enchant all the ruby necklaces in to as many [[Digsite pendant]]s as you'll need.

# Use a [[Digsite pendant]] to teleport to the Digsite
# Run north-west and enter the [[Earth Altar]]
# Cast [[Magic imbue]]
# Use [[Water rune]]s on the altar
# Empty all the runecrafting pouches and use water runes on the altar again
# Teleport to Castle Wars with the [[ring of dueling]] and bank, storing [[Mud rune]]s and filling pouches and inventory with [[Pure essence]]

* Every '''4''' runs, replace your nearly empty [[Digsite Pendant|Digsite Pendant(1)]] with a new [[Digsite Pendant|Digsite Pendant(5)]]
* Every '''8''' runs, in addition to above, equip a new [[Binding Necklace]] and new [[Ring of Dueling]] as well (Current ones would have turned to dust)
* When you run out (or are nearly running out) of energy at a bank, take a [[Teleport to house (tablet)]] with you for your next run and use it to replenish energy at a [[Revitalization pool]]. Alternatively, a player can use their ring of dueling to teleport to [[Ferox Enclave]] and begin the next run by drinking from the [[Pool of Refreshment]] to replenish run energy before teleporting to the digsite.
** At 70+ agility with full graceful (minus hood), expect to use a house tablet every 8 runs (this syncs up with the binding necklace expiring)
* When your pouches degrade, withdraw 2 [[Air rune]] and a [[Cosmic rune]] and use [[NPC contact]] to contact the [[Dark Mage (Abyss)]] for pouch repairs.

After completing your runs, switch back to the standard spellbook and cast [[High level alchemy]] on your remaining [[Digsite Pendant|Digsite Pendant(1)s]].

=== Balloon run ===
Alternatively, if access to the [[Balloon transport system]] is available it can be used to travel from Castle Wars directly to the Earth Altar for the cost of a [[Willow log]]
Before starting your runs, load up the balloon system with [[Willow log]]s.

This method is slightly slower than the Digsite Pendant one but is considerably simpler (Note: The [[Revitalization pool]] method for restoring energy won't work as well in this run, use [[Stamina potion]]s

# Starting at Castle Wars, run to balloon and take it to Varrock
# Enter the nearby [[Earth Altar]]
# Cast [[Magic imbue]]
# Use [[Water rune]]s on the altar
# Empty all the essence pouches and use water runes on the altar again
# Teleport to Castle Wars with the [[ring of dueling]] and bank, storing [[Mud rune]]s and filling pouches and inventory with [[Pure essence]]

* Every '''8''' runs, equip a new [[Binding Necklace]] and new [[Ring of Dueling]] as well (Current ones would have turned to dust)

=== Notes ===
* You can replace the [[Steam battlestaff]] with a stack of [[Fire rune]]s and extra [[Water rune]]s but this will use up an essence spot
* If you don't have access to a [[Revitalization pool]], you can instead use [[Stamina potion]]s but these will typically cost more to maintain your run energy compared to [[Teleport to house (tablet)]]s
* The [[Ring of dueling]] can be replaced with any teleport near a bank
** A charged [[Amulet of glory]] to Edgeville works for a cheaper alternative but requires replacing every 4 runs and takes up an essence space
** With [[Crafting cape]] and the [[Falador diary#Hard]] completed, the crafting guild bank is a free teleport alternative that won't take up an essence space.
